unnormalised: Bangalore's traffic is legendary, right? Well, get ready for some changes! New traffic regulations are hitting the streets soon, according to sources inside the Karnataka Transport Department.
normalised: Bengaluru's traffic is legendary, right? Well, get ready for some changes! New traffic regulations are hitting the streets soon, according to sources inside the Karnataka Transport Department.

unnormalised: Apparently, stricter enforcement of lane discipline is coming, meaning no more weaving through traffic like you're driving a rickshaw in Chandni Chowk. Plus, fines for speeding are reportedly going up – potentially reaching a hefty Rs. 5000 for repeat offenders! Ouch!
normalised: Apparently, stricter enforcement of lane discipline is coming, meaning no more weaving through traffic like you are driving a rickshaw in Chandni Chowk. Plus, fines for speeding are reportedly going up – potentially reaching a hefty rupee five thousand for repeat offenders! Ouch!

unnormalised: The crackdown is aimed at reducing accidents, especially during festival season. Think everyone rushing home to Kerala for Onam. Total chaos!
normalised: The crackdown is aimed at reducing accidents, especially during festival season. Think everyone rushing home to Kerala for Onam. Total chaos!

unnormalised: Also, whispers are that the permissible limit for tinted windows is being reduced even further. So, ditch that black film, uncle!
normalised: Also, whispers are that the permissible limit for tinted windows is being reduced even further. So, ditch that black film, uncle!

unnormalised: They're even looking at enforcing minimum speeds on certain stretches of the Outer Ring Road. Imagine getting a challan for driving *too slow*!
normalised: They are even looking at enforcing minimum speeds on certain stretches of the Outer Ring Road. Imagine getting a challan for driving *too slow*!

unnormalised: Officials claim the new rules will make Bengaluru's roads safer and smoother, like a perfectly cooked plate of biryani.
normalised: Officials claim the new rules will make Bengaluru's roads safer and smoother, like a perfectly cooked plate of biryani.

unnormalised: We'll see about that, eh? Stay tuned for more updates, and drive safe, folks! Remember, slow and steady wins the race (and avoids those hefty fines!)
normalised: We will see about that, eh? Stay tuned for more updates, and drive safe, folks! Remember, slow and steady wins the race (and avoids those hefty fines!)
